command: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io
NO_PROXY='*' HTTPS_PROXY='' HTTP_PROXY='' https_proxy='' http_proxy='' artifacts/bin/trivy fs --scanners vuln,secret,misconfig --timeout 10m .
NO_PROXY='*' HTTPS_PROXY='' HTTP_PROXY='' https_proxy='' http_proxy='' artifacts/bin/osv-scanner scan -r .
